TopicTitle: I'm making ksp movie. I'm looking for helpers.

Articles.Content:
Before speaking to the point, You should remember this. My native language is not English. Therefore, an error may be in the grammar.

Please understand about this.

I need custom parts and plugin for movie. now I'm looking for someone who can make custom parts and plugin.

This is a list of the parts which i needed. I'll add some photos soon for Additional description

1. Chairs and Benches

2. Biological scanner

3. 7.5m diameter, 10cm thickness Rotating part(this should be able to hold theweight more than 1,000tons. and it does not included in magic smoke Parts)

4. 20m length piston part (Just same as Rotating part it does not included in magic smoke Parts)

5. Land Rover form suv body&IVA (or subassembly file)-solved

6. Instrument panel part (for EAS-1 External Command Seat)

7. screen (compatible with RasterPropMonitor)

This is a list of the plugin which i needed. I'll add some photos soon for Additional description

1. better B9 HX engine fx in vacuum(I can't edit cfg file. it's too hard.)

2. First person view in EVA

3. RasterPropMonitor patch for near future spacecraft

4. some expressions with hotkey in numpad(Surprise,sadness,happiness,chagrin,the shape of the mouth when speaking)

5. add warp mod in B9's HX engine-solved

Edited October 13, 2014 by BlackDragon Korean

Good to know there are Korean KSP-er.

I'm Asian. Unfortunately I can't help on your big project. All I can do are wishes you all the best and good luck.

Good to know there are Korean KSP-er.

I'm Asian. Unfortunately I can't help on your big project. All I can do are wishes you all the best and good luck.

thankyou. where r u from?

My homeland, Republic of Korea, is not a pathetic state nowadays, but was world most poor country (literally!) only half a century ago, and has had world most psychopathic northern sibling. Things change, but if only you believe in that. At least, we Asians, have a great and prideful history. One who was great can be great. Never forget that.

Edited September 22, 2014 by FennexFox

[MOD - I've moved this thread to the General Add-on Affairs subforums, since this is a request for custom parts / plugins. I've also edited the thread title for clarity.

Also, a friendly reminder to stay on topic with regards to the original request, instead of discussing nationalities and politics.]
My apologize to misleading topic into potential conflict. I was really careless.

What kind of FX do you want for the B9 engine?

And by warp function do you mean the KSP-I warp function? Not sure if it would be possible to add it to the engine itself but one could make a custom part that could sit just in front of the engine that has the warp functions, these are all pretty easy as it is just messing with the part cfgs, although I can understand how playing with them would be difficult for someone not familiar with english.

As for the rest I'm not a modeler so I can't really help you there, and it's been years since I messed around with code, and that was C++ not C#, so can't really help much there either.
Do you want this like add-ons in game or just models?
